articles.author: Rachel Burgess
articles.title: Nissan confirms all-electric Micra successor for Europe - Autocar
articles.description: Reinvented supermini will use the same CMF-BEV platform as Renault's revived 5 EV

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Russia, Ukraine agree to keep ceasefire, new talks next month - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: PARIS: Envoys from Moscow and Kyiv on Wednesday committed to a fragile ceasefire in eastern Ukraine during talks in Paris and agreed to continue their.
articles.content: Russia, Ukraine agree to keep ceasefire, new talks next month
